review: Crashes a lot.  Great bang for the buck.  The UI shows what Amazon wants to force on me, not what I use.
author: Robert Mudryk

review: EASY TO SETUP / NO NEED FOR ANY OTHER DEVISE TO WATCH NETFLIX / GREAT PICTURE AND SOUND. WELL WORTH THE SMALL INVESTMENT.
author: Steve P.

review: We already have a Roku for streaming.We bought this just for the game apps. We love fibbage!
author: OptimaK

review: Cute works well except the only flaw is that it won't cast like google chromecast.I have both.
author: eukiusa

review: Its great watching movies on my tv instead of watching them on my computer.
author: Valerie C.

review: So easy to set up and use, very easy to add apps (if on Amazon). Well worth the price.
author: the-wolfer

review: Some of the apps run slow and lag a bit. Pandora has to be the paid version, as do many of the other apps available. Overall, good product, but improvements can certainly be made for convenience and speed.
author: Alexis Lassonde

review: Excellent product. Very happy with my purchase.
author: Andrew Downing

review: It was easy to set up.  It took all the work out of watching movies.
author: Lloyd Allen
